text:
Radio calisthenics are perfect for warm-up
exercises because they use your whole body──!

(Ah, Haruki mentioned it last time──
 Huh?)

......But why are you so
excited to share this secret...?

Hehe
It's a secret Haruki-chan told me last time──!

So, I thought I'd secretly share it with you too,
Producer-san?

(Was it okay for her to tell me this secret...?
 Is this really a secret in the first place...?)
(...I'll just pretend I didn't hear anything)
